reviewText:
My brother was a part of The Berlin Air Lift as a member of the Army Air Corp--which became the Air Force.  He's 82 years old and loved this gift!

Thank you.

This DVD contains 66 minutes of black & white footage from the Berlin Airlift of 1948/1949. There is no sound in this recording.  I'm am doing research on the Airlift and being able to see real footage really helps me get a feel for what these people we going through.
